pages.text: First of all, I want to express my deep gratitude to the girl under nickname $(#ea7f17)$(l)MiruNyashka$() and her community.$(br2)Thank you for inspiring me with your creativity to take this path for the first time and start developing my own modifications!

Not always the Distant Worlds mod was the way we see it now, but I was still accepted in your community and supported. After some time, cooperation with you gave me a second wind and understanding that there are many people for whom I want to work further. With these thoughts, I took my project to a whole new level of quality, starting from scratch.

Thank you for cheering and inspiring me in the saddest and most joyful moments, and most importantly, for not letting me abandon this wonderful project.$(br)Know that you are also an important part of this mod, there is a lot of your merit here, and without you there would be nothing. $(br)I wish you inspiration, success in your work and all the best!$(br)Have a nice game!

pages.title: Links
pages.text: Click on the text to follow the link!$(br2)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSko00FmY5mMDGi5bzUaRzA)YouTube Channel$(/l)
